overview: Enis Ayar is one of the ‘good guys’ known both for his individual actions and mass events, such as the thousand-kilometer march from Istanbul to Ordu, or the VW Beetle Festival. Also known as “Enis the Argonaut”, the legendary Enis Ayar lives in Ordu, a city which he has slowly but determinedly been trying with all his might to beautify.
title: An Argonaut in Ordu
